channel.title: [317] Editing Smite to resemble soulsplit [Delta]
channel.description: How can I edit the "Smite" prayer to both drain 1/4 of your hit to the enemies prayer, and 1/4 of your hit heal u(like soulsplit. So if I hit a 100 it would drain the enemies prayer by 25, and heal me by 25. Like a soulsplit effect w/ the healing sorta, but yeah. Any ideas how I would make this? I know where to find the case in clickingmost.java, i just dont know what the code would be
